title: Introducing XDA Forum Violation Passes: Stick it to the big man if youâ€™ve got the dough
content:
The XDA Forums have been the primary home to millions of members and numerous community projects. As we enter our 20th anniversary this year, it’s time we address one of the biggest complaints that forum users have with the forums. We hear you: the XDA Forums have rules, and you don’t like rules. And we’d

The post Introducing XDA Forum Violation Passes: Stick it to the big man if you’ve got the dough appeared first on xda-developers.
description: XDA Forum Members have long wanted to break rules. We listened. Introducing XDA Forum Violation Pass, letting you live ban-free on our forums.
